entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
